subject: Voltage Selector Malfunction â€“ VoltStyle Pro
body:
Hello,

The voltage selector on my VoltStyle Pro (Model VSP-800) does not stay in position, causing the dryer to shut off. This appears to be a manufacturing defect. Kindly process my warranty claim.

Sincerely,
Sophia Martin
